trigger.expression: {TEMPLATE.TM_WINDOWS_CPU_SERVICE:system.cpu.util[,system,].last()} >= 90 and ({TEMPLATE.TM_WINDOWS_CPU_SERVICE:perf_counter[\Process(cpuz)\% Processor Time].last()} / {TEMPLATE.TM_WINDOWS_CPU_SERVICE:system.cpu.num.last()}) >= 10 and ({TEMPLATE.TM_WINDOWS_CPU_SERVICE:perf_counter[\Process(cpuz)\% Processor Time].last()} / {TEMPLATE.TM_WINDOWS_CPU_SERVICE:system.cpu.num.last()}) > (90 - {TEMPLATE.TM_WINDOWS_CPU_SERVICE:system.cpu.util[,system,].last()})
trigger.name: CPU-Z SERVICE CPU USAGE

trigger.expression: {TEMPLATE.TM_WINDOWS_CPU_SERVICE:system.cpu.util[,system,].last()} >= 90 and ({TEMPLATE.TM_WINDOWS_CPU_SERVICE:perf_counter[\Process(zabbix_agent2)\% Processor Time].last()} / {TEMPLATE.TM_WINDOWS_CPU_SERVICE:system.cpu.num.last()}) >= 20 and ({TEMPLATE.TM_WINDOWS_CPU_SERVICE:perf_counter[\Process(zabbix_agent2)\% Processor Time].last()} / {TEMPLATE.TM_WINDOWS_CPU_SERVICE:system.cpu.num.last()}) > (90 - {TEMPLATE.TM_WINDOWS_CPU_SERVICE:system.cpu.util[,system,].last()})
trigger.name: ZABBIX AGENT SERVICE CPU USAGE
